name: Apeeln Technologies Inc.
overview:
Apeeln Technologies Incorporation (ATI) is a leading Systems Integrator providing technology products, services, and supply chain solutions to customers around the globe. ATI understands today’s advanced technologies, including Unified Communications, Security, Data Center, Wireless Mobility . When properly planned, procured, and deployed, these business solutions reduce costs, increase profitability and ultimately improve a company’s ability to effectively serve their customers.

Founded in 2001, ATI has grown from a small startup to a world-class organization exceeding $3 billion in revenue and over 700 highly trained employees.
